channel.title: python on Argy's Corner
channel.description: Recent content in python on Argy's Corner

item.title: Asynchronous tasks with python3 concurrent futures
item.description: +++ title = “Asynchronous tasks with python3 concurrent futures” date = 2015-02-16T02:13:50Z author = “Argyrios Gounaris” +++ Today Greece is again all over the news because of the Eurogroup and the new deal the Greek governemnt tries to achieve through its representatives. Why not check out which website has a title about Greece on it’s front page as fast as possible. Python 3.2 introduced concurrent futures which is actually a simple interface for asynchronous parallel tasks.
